Sections.Text: The escaping patients have found the formula for Tyree's serum. Whoever is carrying the it must now escape the sanitorium.
If the intruder carrying the formula is killed, Tyree will recover it and there will be no stopping his insane experimentation.
Stealing the forumla has triggered an alarm, bringing more sanitorium staff into the area, making it harder to escape as time ticks by.
